actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary with amendment, S. Rept. 95-1225.
Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Doctor Cosme R. Cagas, his wife, Linda San Diego Cagas, and his children, Elcee Cagas, Chess Cagas, Georgina Cagas, and Chester Cagas.

summary.text: Declares six individuals lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Doctor Cosme R. Cagas, his wife, Linda San Diego Cagas, and his children, Elcee Cagas, Chess Cagas, Georgina Cagas, and Chester Cagas.
